name: World Battle of Tanks
description:
I am a lover of tank action, a world giant in the world of tanks. But he decided to make his own tanks. The project is under development and will soon be on github. The repository already exists, but is closed to the public. The game uses partially files from the world of tanks. Our project needs enthusiasts like us to speed up development. Join our discord, regardless of the language you speak.

The latest version is up to date. Technical demo. 3 bots and you are one. Try to survive.

This is not the final client replication. The archive also contains launcher files for auto-update. To enter, use the username Demo, and the password is six zeros (000000)

join the discord https://discord.gg/32XNz4
